items.name: Asaba Contemporary Gallery
items.short_description: Explore a vibrant collection of modern Nigerian and West African art, featuring works from emerging talents and established masters. A hub for creative expression and cultural dialogue.
items.address: Plot 15, Okpanam Road, Asaba, Delta State

items.name: Delta Wonderland Family Park
items.short_description: A sprawling amusement park offering thrilling rides, interactive games, and entertainment for all ages. Perfect for family outings and memorable adventures.
items.address: Benin-Asaba Expressway, close to Head Bridge, Asaba

items.name: Niger Delta Waterfront Walk
items.short_description: Enjoy a scenic stroll along the newly developed promenade offering breathtaking views of the River Niger, lush landscaping, and vibrant outdoor cafes. A tranquil escape in the heart of the city.

items.name: Prestige Cinema & Games Arena
items.short_description: Experience the latest blockbusters in state-of-the-art cinemas, then challenge friends at the extensive games arcade and virtual reality zones. Your ultimate entertainment destination.
items.address: Summit Road, GRA Phase III, Asaba

items.name: Asaba Green Oasis
items.short_description: Discover diverse plant species, tranquil walking trails, and educational exhibits focused on Nigerian flora and fauna. A serene haven for nature lovers and environmental enthusiasts.
items.address: Ibusa Road, near Asaba Airport, Asaba

items.name: Grand Delta Mall
items.short_description: Asaba's premier destination for luxury shopping, international brands, and a diverse range of dining experiences. Enjoy a sophisticated atmosphere for retail therapy and gourmet meals.

items.name: Silicon Delta Co-working & Innovation Center
items.short_description: A vibrant space for entrepreneurs, tech enthusiasts, and creatives to collaborate, learn, and innovate. Features modern co-working spaces, event halls, and incubation programs.
items.address: DLA Road, GRA Phase II, Asaba

items.name: Asaba Canopy Adventures
items.short_description: Get your adrenaline pumping with exhilarating zip lines, high ropes courses, and challenging obstacle challenges set amidst natural forest. An unforgettable outdoor adventure experience.

items.name: Taste of Asaba Food Market
items.short_description: A bustling open-air market showcasing the best of local and international street food. Sample diverse flavors, enjoy live music, and experience Asaba's vibrant culinary scene.

items.name: The Azure Oasis Resort & Spa
items.short_description: Indulge in luxury at this exclusive resort offering day passes to its infinity pool, world-class spa facilities, and gourmet dining. A perfect retreat for relaxation and rejuvenation.
items.address: GRA Phase I, off Okpanam Road, Asaba
